item.title: Python Advanced Skills
item.description: Useful tools pytest Advanced methods yield 如果一个函数中使用yield来修饰一变量，那么这个函数会作为一个generate(), 当调用此函数的时候，并不会运行此函数，而是

item.title: Python Object Oriented Programming
item.description: OOP Here is a classical picture: Although is funny, it actually describes the OOP concept. Class: A set to describe which has the same attributes and methods. Object: is the instance of a class Class variables: Public in its instance object, usually are defined beyond function in a class. Data members: ? Rewrite method: A original method inherited from thee parent class can be modified if is can not meet the needs of the subclass.

item.title: Python Simple Tutorial
item.description: Common Functions print() Print the characters into the screen. input() 等待用户在键盘上输入一些文本，并按下回车键，将此文本作为字符串赋值给一个变量。 len() 得到len中字符串字符的个数 str(), int(), float() str
